problem_text_en: Knowing that AB is a chord of a circle O with a radius of N_0, and AB = a < N_1, take AB as one side and make a equilateral triangle △ABC in circle O, point D is a point on circle O that is different from point A, and DB = AB = a, the extended line of DC intersects circle O at point E, then the length of AE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴AB=BC=AC=BD=a,∠CAB=∠ACB=60°；∵AB=BD,∴⁀{AB}=⁀{BD},∴∠AED=∠AOB；∵BC=AB=BD,∴∠D=∠BCD；∵四边形EABD内接于⊙O,∴∠EAB+∠D=180°,即∠EAC+60°+∠D=180°；又∵∠ECA+60°+∠BCD=180°,∴∠ECA=∠EAC,即△EAC是等腰三角形；在等腰△EAC和等腰△OAB中,∠AEC=∠AOB,∵AC=AB,∴△EAC≌△OAB；∴AE=OA=1．故选:B．
